name: GetCloser
0:
”Alexa open get closer”
”Alexa, play get closer”
skdetail:
This skill contains: dynamic content.
Invocation Name: get closer
des: Get Closer is a social experience. Designed for connection. Designed for fun. Two themes: 1. Questions for interesting, deep and exciting conversations. 2. Play. Activities that probably will challenge you and will make you laugh a lot. Probably. Play as a group, play with a friend, as a couple, with a stranger, perhaps even on your own.
priv:
Developer Privacy Policy
The developer reported that this skill does not collect personal information.
